import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" function Recipes() { const [recipes, setRecipes] = useState(); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; useEffect(() => { getRecipes(); }, []); const getRecipes = async () => { let response = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/recipe/getAllRecipes'); setRecipes(response.data); }; const orderNow = async()=>{ const {paymentMethod} = await stripe.createPaymentMethod({ type: 'card', card: card, }); console.log(paymentMethod) let response = await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/", {id:paymentMethod.id}); console.log(response); } return (

Latest Recipes

{recipes?.map((recipe, index) => (

{recipe.recipe_title}

{recipe.prep_time}

))}

); } export default Recipes;
